section.title: Disable HAL Daemon
section.para:
Disables the Hardware Abstraction Layer (HAL) daemon (haldaemon). The haldaemon provides a dynamic way of managing device interfaces. It automates device configuration and provides an API for making devices accessible to applications through the D-Bus interface. Since HAL provides valuable attack surfaces to attackers as an intermediary to privileged operations, it should be disabled unless necessary.
